info.title: Dim Tvaryn API
info.description:
Dim Tvaryn API provides a comprehensive set of endpoints for managing animal adoption listings, user interactions, and platform functionalities. This online platform aims to connect homeless animals with potential adopters efficiently and securely.

Some useful links:
- [The Dim Tvaryn repository](https://github.com/orgs/Dim-Tvarin/repositories)
